title: India scores on subsidies for green H2: ReNew CEO
description: The global adoption of green hydrogen is slower than expected due to its higher cost compared to grey hydrogen. ReNew's CEO, Sumant Sinha, highlights the need for subsidies and mandates to drive progress. India is advancing faster with subsidies and procurement tenders. Europe and Japan face challenges in subsidy implementation.
